name: 3D First-Person Shooter
description:
Modifications:

1- An entire level (Level 3)

2- Adding 4 bosses and too many enemies to test the engine's ability to have that number of enemies.

3- Adding a big terrain that includes three different roads and ways to play level 3.

4- Creating an environment that is similar to the local environment north of my country (Mountains and desert).

5- Changing the player's speed and the shooting's speed to make it a little bit faster to enhance the time spending on the game.
